name: IT201_Sprint2_Gavin_Dawson
description:
This is an aim trainer type game. 

Adjust the slider in the bottom right to change the color of the target, you can also select a crosshair from the "Select crosshair"  dropdown menu,  as well as enable or disable the crosshair.

The game starts when you click the start button

The speed of the cube can be changed in the inspector

Have fun!!
